topic.title: Why do I get an "UnsatisfiedLinkError: no svnjavahl in java.library.path"?

section.p: On Windows, you need to install the Collabnet Subversion client on your computer. After successful installation, you additionally need to copy the files in the svn folder of your bundle to the collabnet subversion client installation folder to enable the Java binding. The target folder is typically:C:\Program Files\Collabnet Subversion
